casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Bernard George LAMP, Jr. No. 222A14-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Dec. 16, 2015. Anne M. Gomez, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Lamp, Bernard George (Jr.). Kathleen M. Joyce, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Lamp, Bernard George (Jr.). Robert C. Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Sarah M. Kirkman, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. G. Glenn Gerding, Durham, Attorney at Law, for Lamp, Bernard George (Jr.). Sarah Kirkman, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 16th of December 2015 by Defendant to Allow Substitution of Appellate Counsel:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 16th of December 2015."
